project.description:
cSync SCM build scripts, EAT, help files and other files as needed for packaging.
Retrieve tar.gz files from UI and RR build.
Extract TestCenter.Windows.no_version.tar.gz, ResultsReporter.tar.gz UI and RR tar.gz files to bin/release folder.
Retrieve TestCenter_WebHelp.tar.gz, Provisioning_WebHelp.tar.gz, ServerManager_WebHelp.tar.gz from webhelp build.
Run EAT ANT build
Run setver.py to set the version of the TestCenter binary files.
Run ci_packageinstaller.pl to create P2_installer and FORTHOT installer files.
Run ci_packageinstaller.pl to create DMCP installer files.
Copy build results to \\martin\archive\pv\TestCenter\4.10\Engineering_Builds\integration\BUILDVERSION
Jenkins Node(s): spccalengec01, spccalpvxpvm-01, spccalengec02

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: RELEASE_TYPE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The release type tag displayed in STC GUI Help-About and splash screen. Available option are: - Alpha - Beta - RELEASE (no release type tag will be displayed in the GUI if set to 'RELEASE')

scm.projectOptions: noallwrite clobber nocompress unlocked nomodtime rmdir

hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command: del BLL_changelist*.txt del UI_changelist*.txt del /f Win64ResultsReporter.tar del /f Win64ResultsReporter.tar.gz exit /B 0

info.propertiesContent: PYTHONUNBUFFERED=1 PATH=C:\Tcl\bin;C:\Windows\system32;C:\Windows;C:\Windows\System32\Wbem;C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\;C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft SQL Server\90\Tools\binn\;C:\Program Files\Perforce;d:\utils;c:\python27;"D:\Program Files(x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\Common7\IDE";d:\utils;d:\perl64\bin;c:\apache-ant-1.6.5\bin;"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin";"C:\Program Files\7-Zip";C:\Program Files (x86)\NCover\;D:\Program Files (x86)\Perforce;D:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_35\bin

hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command:
echo extracting TestCenter.Windows.no_version.tar.gz file from job %COPYARTIFACT_BUILD_NUMBER_UI% python framework\tools\buildUtil\package.py --install TestCenter.Windows.no_version.tar.gz --directory=bin/Release echo extracting STAKCommands.beta.Windows.tar.gz file from job %COPYARTIFACT_BUILD_NUMBER_UI% python framework\tools\buildUtil\package.py --install STAKCommands.beta.Windows.tar.gz --directory=STAKCommands
REM 0-padding build number SET FULLVER=00%BLL_BUILD_NUMBER%6 if %BLL_BUILD_NUMBER% gtr 9 SET FULLVER=0%BLL_BUILD_NUMBER%6 if %BLL_BUILD_NUMBER% gtr 99 SET FULLVER=%BLL_BUILD_NUMBER%6 echo FULLVER is %FULLVER%
xcopy /S /I /E /Y %WORKSPACE%\STAKCommands\STAKCommands\*.* M:\TestCenter\%STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION%\Engineering_Builds\GUI_BLL\%STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION%.%FULLVER%\STAKCommands xcopy /S /I /E /Y %WORKSPACE%\framework\automation\scripting\stc\SampleScripts\*.* M:\TestCenter\%STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION%\Engineering_Builds\GUI_BLL\%STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION%.%FULLVER%\SampleScripts

echo extracting Win32ResultsReporter.tar.gz file from job %COPYARTIFACT_BUILD_NUMBER_RESULTS_REPORTER_WINDOWS% python framework\tools\buildUtil\package.py --install Win32ResultsReporter.tar.gz --directory=framework/ui/resultsanalysis/dist
p4 info set
c:\python27\python %WORKSPACE%\Build_Scripts\Scripts\ci_run_jenkins_steps.py --updaterrjarversion=yes
echo extracting Win64ResultsReporter.tar.gz file from job %COPYARTIFACT_BUILD_NUMBER_RESULTS_REPORTER_WINDOWS% python framework\tools\buildUtil\package.py --install Win64ResultsReporter.tar.gz --directory=framework/ui/resultsanalysis/windows_dist/windows_x64
p4 info set
c:\python27\python %WORKSPACE%\Build_Scripts\Scripts\ci_run_jenkins_steps.py --updaterrjarversion64=yes
echo zip Win64ResultsReporter.tar.gz del /f /q Win64ResultsReporter.tar.gz
7z a -ttar Win64ResultsReporter.tar %WORKSPACE%\framework\ui\resultsanalysis\windows_dist\windows_x64\* 7z a -tgzip Win64ResultsReporter.tar.gz Win64ResultsReporter.tar
c:\python27\python %WORKSPACE%\Build_Scripts\Scripts\ci_run_jenkins_steps.py --runcopywinrr64tomartin=yes
echo Running EAT Ant build c:\python27\python %WORKSPACE%\Build_Scripts\Scripts\ci_run_jenkins_steps.py --updateeatversion=yes cd framework\ui\EAT ant -f build_windows.xml&&ant -f build_linux.xml

cd %WORKSPACE%\bin\release SET DEPENDENT_JOB_NAME=%JOB_NAME% copy D:\jenkins-rel\release_bll_windows_packaging_new\bin\Release\NTAF\tool\Stc420Publication.xml D:\jenkins-rel\release_bll_windows_packaging_new\bin\Release\NTAF\tool\Stc474Publication.xml /y c:\python27\python %WORKSPACE%\Build_Scripts\Scripts\ci_run_jenkins_steps.py --createpropfile=yes --runcimaketarballs=no --runsetver=yes --updateilversionxml=yes --updatereleasetag=yes --updatepkgindextcl=yes --updatespirenttestcentertcl=yes --updatestclibtcl=yes --updategemspecversion=yes --updatentafxml=yes
perl %WORKSPACE%\Build_Scripts\STC_Build_Scripts\ci_packageinstaller.pl %WORKSPACE% %WORKSPACE%\Installer %STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION%.%FULLVER% STC_APP_COPY_ONLY perl %WORKSPACE%\Build_Scripts\STC_Build_Scripts\ci_packageinstaller.pl %WORKSPACE% %WORKSPACE%\Installer %STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION%.%FULLVER% COMPILE_FORTHOT perl %WORKSPACE%\Build_Scripts\STC_Build_Scripts\ci_packageinstaller.pl %WORKSPACE% %WORKSPACE%\Installer %STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION%.%FULLVER% PACKAGE_P2_INSTALLER perl %WORKSPACE%\Build_Scripts\STC_Build_Scripts\ci_packageinstaller.pl %WORKSPACE% %WORKSPACE%\Installer %STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION%.%FULLVER% COPY_P2_INSTALLER rem exit /B 0

echo Creating EAT.Unix.tar.gz for unix distribution 7z a -ttar EAT.Unix.tar %WORKSPACE%\framework\ui\EAT\Release_Linux\* 7z a -ttar EAT.Unix.tar %WORKSPACE%\framework\ui\EAT\Build_Linux\configuration 7z a -ttar EAT.Unix.tar %WORKSPACE%\framework\ui\EAT\Build_Linux\plugins 7z a -ttar EAT.Unix.tar %WORKSPACE%\framework\ui\EAT\Build_Linux\.eclipseproduct 7z a -tgzip EAT.Unix.tar.gz EAT.Unix.tar del EAT.Unix.tar
